I’m a proud supporter of the Never Again Education Act so schools receive grants for educational programs about the Holocaust. Parents and schools must teach our kids Nazism’s vile history of hate. Political leaders must show them that America’s values aren’t just empty words.
When it’s such a short leap from Nazi salutes at school to terrorist violence in places like El Paso, there’s only one right thing to do: confront and stamp out these ideologies wherever they arise.

THREAD: I was raised by the generation who risked their lives to defeat Nazism.
